articles.title: Alarming 30-fold rise in measles in Europe - WHO - BBC.com
articles.description: Urgent measures are needed now to stop further spread, the World Health Organization says.
articles.content:
By Philippa RoxbyHealth reporter
There was an "alarming" 30-fold increase in measles cases in Europe last year, the World Health Organization (WHO) says.
Health chiefs are warning that cases are st… [+4265 chars]
